Very  heavy  showers  about  150mm  are  likely  at  some  places  in  Eastern,  Uva  and  Central
provinces and in Polonnaruwa district. Heavy showers above 100mm are likely at some places
in North-Western and Northern provinces and Anuradhapura district.
Strong winds about (50-60) kmph can be expected at times over the Eastern, Uva, Western,
Central and Sabaragamuwa provinces and in Galle, Matara, Mullaitivu, Jaffna and Kilinochchi
